comments:
20020409
1. junit 3.7
2. insert
	static void npe(){
		throw new NullPointerException();
	}
into junit.samples.AllTests
3. set a breakpoint in main and 
put: npe() as the condition

4. debug - no error dialog but the following is added to the log:
